name: Untitled Game :}
description:
A small, yet ambitious work in progress with some ideas in mind:

  • Dialogue System with branching narrative
    • Based on this playlist by Trever Mock  ( Source Code)
  • Inventory
  • Metroidvania?
  • A mixture of different game styles (Some parts TopDown, some Platformer, and perhaps some 3D).
  • 100% Original Assets (Pixel Art and Audio made on FMOD Studio and Audacity)

Support the project and watch it evolve!

Github Project
